Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Most of our Midtown NY hotel's guest rooms measure between 340 and 425 square feet. That's 40 percent larger than the average NYC hotel room!

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Table 866, our convenient restaurant, serves a variety of refreshing and healthy breakfast options as well as specialty Starbucks beverages.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: With 420 square feet of event space and a full catering menu, our hotel in Midtown NYC is the ideal location for your next meeting or social soiree.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our Midtown accommodations offer spacious guest rooms with stunning New York City views.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Each guest room at our hotel in Midtown East NY features a 37-inch flat-screen cable television.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Spacious rooms are on the 14th through 31st floors, reducing street noise for a peaceful slumber.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Stay connected at our hotel in Midtown East NY with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Comfortable pull-out sofas are available to accommodate additional guests at our NYC hotel.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Coffee makers, mini-refrigerators and large work desks are among additional room amenities.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Our Midtown accommodations offer spacious guest rooms with stunning New York City views.
Each guest room at our hotel in Midtown East NY features a 37-inch flat-screen cable television.
Spacious rooms are on the 14th through 31st floors, reducing street noise for a peaceful slumber.
Stay connected at our hotel in Midtown East NY with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet.
Comfortable pull-out sofas are available to accommodate additional guests at our NYC hotel.
Coffee makers, mini-refrigerators and large work desks are among additional room amenities.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Enjoy sophisticated shopping, dining and art exhibits at Rockefeller Center, just a short walk away.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our hotel near the East Side of New York is within walking distance of Grand Central Station.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: The shops and museums of Fifth Avenue are minutes from our hotel near the East Side of NY.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Perfect for intimate events, our Manhattan conference room can accommodate up to 30 guests.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our Midtown East meeting room offers 420 square feet of space and can be easily booked online.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: The experienced catering staff can create custom menus just for your Midtown meeting or event.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Meeting guests will enjoy our hotel's convenient location near top New York City attractions.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: High-speed Internet and a variety of audiovisual equipment are available in our meeting venue.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Reserve 10 or more guest rooms for your event attendees and receive a discounted room rate.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: For your convenience, check availability and book our Midtown East event space online.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our Midtown East meeting room offers approximately 400 square feet of flexible event space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Event attendees will appreciate our hotel's unbeatable location near top shopping and dining.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Perfect for intimate receptions and reunions, our meeting space can accommodate up to 30 guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: The professional catering team can create refreshing menus just for your Manhattan event.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Tour and group business is always welcome. Bus parking is available at our Midtown East hotel.

Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: All guest rooms at this hotel offer complimentary wireless Internet access

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Our Midtown New York hotel offers an unbeatable location near Grand Central Station and Rockefeller Center as well as exceptional amenities including complimentary high-speed wireless Internet, an on-site breakfast restaurant and 24-hour fitness center.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: The Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East is the perfect choice for business and leisure travelers visiting New York City. Offering first-class services while sitting high on the 14th through 31st floors, our hotel in Midtown New York features contemporary accommodations that are 40 percent larger than average NYC hotel rooms. Guest quarters offer luxurious Marriott bedding, spacious work desks, ergonomic chairs, 37-inch TVs with cable and breathtaking views of the city that never sleeps. Our Midtown New York hotel boasts complimentary high-speed WiFi in all guest rooms as well as a 24-hour fitness center, restaurant serving breakfast and Starbucks beverages and The Market for various sundries. Located on the prestigious East Side of Manhattan near Broadway shows and a wide variety of renowned NYC restaurants, our Midtown East hotel is within walking distance of Grand Central Station and Rockefeller Center. For an unforgettable New York experience, book your stay at the Courtyard today.

Description.Name: HWS Header Tag
Description.Text: Explore Manhattan from our Midtown East hotel

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Our hotel in Midtown New York is within walking distance of Rockefeller Center and Grand Central Station. Other nearby attractions include Times Square, the Empire State Building and all the shops, restaurants and museums of Fifth Avenue.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take Grand Central Pkwy West to Triborough Bridge, cross over bridge and take FDR Drive South to exit 49th St. Continue on 49th St., turn right on 3rd Ave.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Save up to 20% OFF Regular Rates in New York City during our Presidents Weekend Sale! Book your next stay this Friday, February 13, 2015 - Monday, February 16, 2015 and get the best rates of the year! Valid through: April 30, 2015. Reservations must be prepaid and are non-refundable.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Ideal group size is 25-50 group rooms. This is a slower season in NYC especially in February. We can be more flexible with pattern and groups will be able to find favorable rates.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Even though we experience both high corporate and leisure demand during this time period. The hotel welcomes a group base of 50 rooms per night, more on shoulder nights such as Fridays and Sundays. Major Events: NYU hotel Confernce June, Easter

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Ideal group size is 25-50 rooms. This is a very hgh leisure demand time for us. Although this period will run high occupanies, rates are more favorable.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Ideal group size for this hotel is 25-50 rooms. This is our higher rated season however, there are need periods where more favorable rates are available. Major Events: UN General Sesssion 2nd & 3rd wk of Sept, 1st 2 wks of Dec Shopping wknds

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Boasting some of the largetst rooms in Manhattan ranging from 335-425 sq.ft., our thoughtfully appointed and newly renovated guest rooms give you the perfect place to work, relax, and recharge

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: From the moment you step into the lobby, you'll discover the unique, artistic style and design found throughout the hotel.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The highlight of our new 12th floor lobby is The Bistro. You can find a quiet corner to meet with friends over a glass of wine or lite fare, or plug-in and work with free wireless high-speed Internet access in our lobbyâs 12th floor sitting area.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: HSIA Upgrade, upgrade and replace safes, upgrade and replace electronic key locks

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: 37" Flat Panels in all guest rooms, refrigerators put in all guest rooms and all smoke detectors replaced with a smoke/carbon monoxide detector.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Complete Case and soft goods renovation

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: The Midtown East Courtyard offers spacious newly renovated guest rooms, complimentary high speed internet, in room complimentary coffee and complimentary business center services allowing you to be comfortable and stay within your budget.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Your attendees will stay productive in our soundproof meeting rooms with natural lighting while our dedicated event professional attends to all of your needs.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Known as the "City That Never Sleeps" your sense of adventure will be awakened on the streets of New York home to Museum Mile, Broadway, World Class shopping, and landmarks such as The Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center and St. Patrick's Cathedral.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: You will stay energized with a heart healthy breakfast in our new 12th Floor Bistro which features views of Midtown Manhattan. Your guests are also steps away from some of New York's finest eateries providing a variety of ethnic dining options.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: Your attendees will experience all of the wonders of New York as we offer a location convenient to top restaurants, Central Park, Fifth Avenue Shopping, Rockefeller Center, The Empire State Building and other famous NYC landmarks.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The newly renovated Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East has everything you need to make your next small business meeting, social function or group outing a success. Convenient to LaGuardia and JFK makes this hotel easy to get to. Our New York City meeting space offers 360 square feet of total meeting space with a maximum capacity of 30. Our 317 spacious guest rooms offer comfortable bedding, refrigerators and complimentary high-speed internet access in every room. In between meetings you will have plenty to explore as our New York City hotel is located in the prestigious East Side of Manhattan close to the finest shopping, dining, nightlife and museums New York City is famous for. Take advantage of our complimentary WiFi in our newly renovated lobby on the 12th floor that offers flexible sitting areas to work or meet with colleagues. The highlight of our 12 floor lobby is our signature Restaurant Table 866 which offers healthy breakfast options and StarbucksÂ® coffee. You can keep up with your healthy lifestyle in our fitness center, open 24 hours a day. Host your next meeting at the Courtyard New York Manhattan Midtown East hotel and experience our luxurious accommodations and professional staff.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: 1.) Ideal group size is 25-50 rooms weekday or weekend. Pattern is always important 2.) The ideal "type" group is corporate small group, tour and travel, Pharmaceutical, Consulting, IT, Financial and Insurance. 3.) Current Business Priority: Shore up occupancy by laying a group base on the books especially on shoulder nights. 4.) Selling differentiators: Guest rooms are very spacious for New York. Conveniently located to corporate offices as well as leisure activites and NYC Landmarks. Meeting Space located on the 12th floor feature large windows with stunning views of Midtown Manhattan. Breakfast available at Table 866 located on the 12th Floor.
